structure.unit: Smart Growth Zoning And Housing Production

law.catch_line: Information In Application For Determination Of Eligibility

text.section: identify and describe the boundaries of the proposed smart growth zoning district;
identify and describe the developable land area within the proposed smart growth zoning district;
identify and describe other residential development opportunities for infill housing and the residential re-use of existing buildings and underutilized buildings within already developed areas;
include a comprehensive housing plan, as set forth in section 8;
include a copy of the proposed smart growth district ordinance or by-law;
by narrative and exhibits, establish the elements set forth in section 6.
